name: My Cup of Tea (zuqini)
description:
• WASD or Arrow Keys to move screens
  • Click and drag items to make tea!
  • Drag tea to the serving platform on the left and press the bell to serve!
  • To stash away items, drag the item to the stash icon
  • (Psssst... really strong tea means 3 bags, teeny bit stronger means 2!)

Game Off 2022 

Cli-ché noun a phrase or opinion that is overused and betrays a lack of original thought.

Our cliché for this game is Not My Cup of Tea.

It's your first day on the job. Your dream is to be the best tea maker in town. Your goal is to make the perfect tea for each and one of your customers. Maybe you'll meet some peculiar individuals that may end up becoming regular at your shop (COMING SOON). Now tighten your apron and get brewing!

How To Play

  1. Take the customer's order
  2. Heat water by pressing the red lever on the kettle base
  3. Assemble drink

COMING SOON

  • Special Customers
  • Shop Customizations 
  • And More!

Credits
